prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry, chibi proportions with large wave translucent Sacred head with unique Vesica Piscis structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying gentle Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Wave Spiral, Merkaba lattice patterns, styled with Angel guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Indigo and neutral grey inspired by intuition angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with taiji pattern sashes and wu wei minimalist garments with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating hemp for simplicity, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Vesica Piscis emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions combined with bamboo staff with gentle spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor AMBRIOL's profile: 'He who continuously comforts', Aethyr LOE, Fire element, Tarot The Moon, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Pisces, embodying the essence: 'When AMBRIOL stands before you, turmoil hushes into a gentle lullaby storm-tossed hearts are soothed by ember-warm dreams of solace.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry
visual_elements.head_shape: large wave translucent Sacred head with unique Vesica Piscis structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with wave facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying gentle Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Wave Spiral, Merkaba lattice patterns, styled with Angel guides influences

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with taiji pattern sashes and wu wei minimalist garments
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating hemp for simplicity
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions combined with bamboo staff
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who continuously comforts'
profile_data.essence: When AMBRIOL stands before you, turmoil hushes into a gentle lullaby storm-tossed hearts are soothed by ember-warm dreams of solace.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Dreamful Respite; guides zephyr-bound messengers.
profile_data.form_description: A mercurial, wave-like humanoid form that shifts between liquid fire and translucent mist, representing the liminal space between dream and consciousness in the LOE Aethyr
profile_data.color_reasoning: Indigo represents intuition and the lunar qualities of Pisces, while silver-blue connects to Yesod's mystical realm and the dreaming consciousness of The Moon tarot archetype
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries that represent transformation, dimensional transit, and the fluid boundaries between conscious states
